articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: California elementary school students hurt after plane apparently dumps fuel over playground
articles.description: Fire crews were tending to multiple patients at an elementary school after reports of an aircraft that apparently dumped fuel onto the school playground while returning to the Los Angeles International Airport on Tuesday.
articles.content:
Fire crews were tending to multiple patients at an elementary school after reports of an aircraft that apparently dumped fuel onto the school playground while returning to the Los Angeles International Airport on Tuesday.

articles.author: Frank Miles
articles.title: Americans drinking more than before Prohibition, stats show
articles.description: Americans are drinking more now than when Prohibition was enacted. What’s more, it’s been rising for two decades, and it’s not clear when it will fall again.
articles.content:
America still has a problem with alcohol, say public health experts.
Americans are drinking more now than when Prohibition was enacted in 1920, and alcohol-related deaths have been rising for the last two decades, according to federal health statistics.
The… [+4402 chars]

articles.author: Nick Givas
articles.title: McCarthy: Pelosi may have held impeachment articles to hurt Sanders' election chances
articles.description: House Minority Leader Kevin McCarthy, D-Calif., hinted on Tuesday that House Speaker Nancy Pelosi, D-Calif, may have withheld the articles of impeachment to hurt Sen. Bernie Sanders, I-Vt., and other 2020 White House hopefuls who serve in the Senate.
articles.content:

articles.author: Louis Casiano
articles.title: Mom of Connecticut infant found frozen to death in 1988 won't be charged, police say
articles.description: The mother of an infant found frozen to death more than three decades ago in a Connecticut parking lot is not expected to face charges, authorities said Tuesday.
articles.content:
The mother of an infant found frozen to death more than three decades ago in a Connecticut parking lot is not expected to face charges, authorities said Tuesday.
